reference_summary:
Supernatural: Season 11 [DVD]
Jared Padalecki  (Actor),     Jensen Ackles  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Boxed Sets, Television
['Supernatural: The Complete Eleventh Season (DVD)', "The thrilling and terrifying journey of the Winchester brothers continues as SUPERNATURAL enters its 11th season. In the show's tenth season, the Winchesters faced their most personal threat yet. The all-powerful Mark of Cain threatened to consume Dean, turning him into one of the monsters he has spent his life hunting. Meanwhile, a formidable witch, Rowena, rose to power to claim her position at the right hand of the King of Hell, Crowley (Mark A. Sheppard). Once Rowena revealed herself to be Crowley's mother, the King was forced to choose between his family and the Winchesters - all while Sam, with the help of fallen angel Castiel (Misha Collins), Crowley, and some unlikely allies, wages a desperate battle to save Dean from the Mark of Cain. Will Sam be able to find a cure for the Mark in time? Will it be enough to save his brother? And a more frightening prospect ... does Dean even want to be saved?", ']]>']

A Company Man
Ji-seob So  (Actor),     Mi-yeon Lee  (Actor),     Sang-yoon Lim  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Action & Adventure
['Product Description', "Hyeong-do (SO Ji-sub) goes to the office every day, but isn't thrilled with the cubicles, the politics, his co-workers, or the management. His job is murder. Literally. At this company, death is all in a day's work. Hyeong-do is a corporate assassin, working for a company specializing in contract killings. He's one of the best, and a loyal employee. But when his new trainee gets killed on the job, he feels an obligation to care for the kid's family and taking his eye off the ball is not how a guy gets promoted. Now, Hyeong-do wants out of the cutthroat rat race to start a new life, but his colleagues have different plans - and retirement may come at a far bloodier price than expected.", 'Review', '"Slick and effective" --Controlled Burning"A blackly satirical comedy" --Film Business Asia']

The Suspect
Gong Yoo  (Actor),     Hee-Soon Park  (Actor),     Sin-Yeon  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Independently Distributed, Action & Adventure
['Product Description', 'Dong-chul (Gong Yoo) is the best field agent in North Korea – until he is abandoned during a mission, his wife and daughter murdered. Hunted and on the run, torn between grief and vengeance, he takes a job as a night driver for the CEO of a powerful corporation. The chairman is brutally assassinated – but gives Dong-chul a pair of glasses before he dies. Now, he’s on the run again. Accused of murder, wanted for treason, and desperate to uncover the volatile national secrets hidden inside the glasses. Dong-Chul wants the truth. And he’ll start a war to get it.', 'DVD EXTRAS', 'English subtitles', 'Review', '“One of the best popcorn movies of the year” – The Seattle Times “Grown up and deadly serious” – Phildelphia Enquirer “Stunning set pieces” – The Los Angeles Times “Dizzying” – The Washington Post']

Wolf Warrior

['Product Description', 'A Chinese special force soldier with extraordinary marksmanship is confronted by a group of deadly foreign mercenaries who are hired to assassinate him by a vicious drug lord.', 'Review', '"Some of the most breathtaking martial arts combat scenes we\'ve seen in quite some time" --MovieCricket.com"[WOLF WARRIOR is] what happens when you put two of the world\'s most gifted fighters on screen together" --Twitch"[Wu Jing and Scott Adkins are] two of the best martial arts actors working today" --Asian Film Strike']

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Interests**: The user maintains a strong interest in supernatural themes, horror, drama, action-thriller genres, and has expanded their appreciation for Korean and Chinese cinema. Their growing fondness for martial arts films, particularly with charismatic actors from Hong Kong and South Korea, highlights a broadening focus on diverse storytelling.

- **Content Type**: They prefer comprehensive collections and boxed sets that enhance their viewing experience, alongside standalone films in action-adventure and martial arts genres. 

- **Format Preference**: Loyal to DVDs for home viewing, the user prioritizes high-quality audio and subtitle options while remaining open to various formats that enrich their cinematic experiences.

- **Engagement**: The user actively engages with favored actors and directors, showing loyalty to prominent figures in their genres while embracing independent and international films, reflecting a curiosity about global cinema.

- **Rating Behavior**: They consistently rate content highly, indicating satisfaction with their purchases. Recent interactions emphasize their appreciation for quality productions and engaging narratives, reaffirming their love for character-driven storytelling.

This latest interaction reaffirms the user's enthusiasm for action-packed narratives, particularly in martial arts films. Their commitment to high-quality presentations and the allure of thrilling plots continue to shape their expanding cinematic palate.
